backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control, storage mixins, user accounts, documents, categories, and admin-only user management APIs.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module that returns state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme tokens defining light/dark mode colors and solid popover backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup enforcing role-based access for dashboard, documents, upload, detail, and admin settings pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate using Internet Identity to block access until the user signs in.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role enforcement wrapper that checks admin/user permissions and returns an unauthorized screen if insufficient.
frontend/src/components/auth/Unauthorize: Unauthorized access screen showing an alert icon, message, and optional navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Provides UI actions to view, download, and delete a document, including confirmation dialogs and menu options.
Implements filter controls for searching and filtering documents by category, office, direction, and date range.
Renders a selectable table of documents with category, office, direction, and date details, enabling navigation to document pages.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Displays an empty-state illustration with a prompt and button to upload the first document.
Defines the main layout shell with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and role‑based options.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerRole: Fetches and exposes the caller’s role with admin/user helpers using React Query.
frontend/src/features/categories/useCate: Loads the list of categories from the backend using React Query.
Provides mutations for adding, updating, and removing categories and offices with query invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useDashb: Fetches dashboard metrics from the backend when the actor is available.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: Defines a mutation to delete a document and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document’s details by ID using React Query.
Fetches and filters documents with pagination, text search, and sorting using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles document uploads including file conversion, metadata creation, backend submission, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via a React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Provides helpers for converting category data into display labels and select options.
frontend/src/lib/exportDocuments.ts: Converts documents into CSV format and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Generates office select options and resolves office names based on category data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with category data and document/user metrics, handling loading and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed document information with preview, metadata, and actions, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Shows a filterable, searchable document list with selection, CSV export, and infinite loading.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides interfaces to add, edit, and delete categories and offices with dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Handles document upload with form fields, validation, progress tracking, and success state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including architecture notes, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests. Tracks role-based access plans, UI fixes, and backend user management requirements.
